Four Fragrances

perfume reviews on silk handkerchiefs
2017
object

For Totokaelo × Perfume Area: Four Fragrances, Perfume Area (Laurel Schwulst & Sydney Shen) presented four new reviews, also printed on silk handkerchiefs, at Totokaelo's New York store (190 Bowery) on Saturday, December 2, 2017.

Readings took place at 4, 4:30, 5, and 5:30pm. Background music by Nico Jacobsen.

Visit project website ↗
